Key Match Events: Suryakumar Yadav hit a walk-off six in the final over
Axar Patel took 2 wickets in 2.2 overs
Arshdeep Singh dismissed Logan van Beek with a bouncer
Kohli and Suryakumar managed to hit a six each in the final over
Pre-Game Insights: Rohit Sharma expects the pitch to be 'a touch slower' than the one in MCG
Both teams decided to keep their unchanged squads
Post-Match Reflections: Suryakumar Yadav won the Player-of-the-Match award
Virat Kohli stated that they needed to get 8-10 runs an over to ensure they had a total for their bowlers to defend
India's win moves them to the top of the Group 2 table with a healthy NRR of 1.425
Miscellaneous Highlights: Netherlands' No. 11 Paul van Meekeren ended the innings with 4, 4, 4 off Arshdeep
R Ashwin's spell was mesmerizing, getting the ball to drift and swing both ways
